title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
instructions: Combine all ingredients. Dress with olive oil and lemon. Season to taste.

title: Oats with Berries and Seeds
instructions: Cook oats in milk. Top with berries and seeds.

title: Lentil & Veggie One-Pot
instructions: Sauté onion, add veg and lentils. Add stock, simmer 15–18 min until tender.

title: Grilled Chicken with Quinoa
instructions: Grill chicken. Cook quinoa. Steam broccoli. Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Tofu Stir-fry with Brown Rice
instructions: Stir-fry tofu, add veg and sauces. Serve over brown rice.

title: Egg & Avocado Sandwich
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon and pepper, add sliced egg, assemble sandwich.

title: Pumpkin & Spinach Soup
instructions: Simmer pumpkin, onion, stock 20–25 min. Blend. Stir in spinach to wilt.

title: Tuna & Bean Salad
instructions: Mix ingredients, dress with oil and vinegar, season to taste.

title: Baked Sweet Potato with Cottage Cheese
instructions: Bake potato 35–40 min. Split and top with cottage cheese and chives.

title: Yoghurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yoghurt, fruit, and granola in a glass.
